categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: K'derek was a male Tarong. Along with his sister, Sk'rirak, K'derek worked with the Alliance to Restore the Republic as information gatherers. K'derek was not as cheerful as other Tarongs due to witnessing acts of torture, interrogations and murder while spying on an Imperial garrison. Vowing to oppose the Empire, K'derek became an expert with explosives.
